title: Stolen From Nottingham 1966 Splitscreen bus RHD deluxe

posts.content:
Really feel for you, I'm informing as many people in the Notts area as I can.



If you get spottings and you want to confirm they're not me then let me know. People may mistake my bus for yours, TFO 895 9 window with an unpainted roof.

I'll PM you my phone number if you need to know where my bus has been at certain times.

Hope it makes it way beck to you ASAP.

Paul

Hi.
So sorry to here about your van.
A few of us are out all weekend round the notts area in our buses and will keep our eye peeled

Wayne
Is there any update on this. I so hope you get it back.......

Always shocking when you hear that some scumbag feels it`s their right to take someone elses pride and joy.
Really hope it`s recovered soon and those responsible are tortured slowly for infinity.
I`ll keep an eye open around Grantham/Newark areas.

Steve
